description: I can say that I am rather calm, kind-hearted and easy-going man. I am very optimistic in my life and in everything I do. I have a good sense of humor and value this quality in another people. I am sure that respect is the main in human relationships. I do not suffer lie, ignorance, cowardice. Relations I prefer to build on liking, trust and dialogue. My motto in a life: Take the first step and will be visible the following.
